content: Frame the Problem: How does the user expect to use and benefit from this model? This is important because it will determine how you should frame the problem, what machine learning algorithms you will propose, which performance measure you will use to evaluate your model, and how much effort you should spend tweaking it.

Select a Performance Measure: Regression Metrics: (Mean Absolute Error, Mean Squared Error, Root Mean Squared Error, Root Mean Squared Log Error, R Squared, Adjusted R Squared). Classification Metrics: (Precision, Accuracy, Recall, F1).
Check the Assumptions: Catch assumptions such as misinterpreting a regression problem for a classification one.
